title: Mapla Singam
overview: Youngsters belonging to two rival factions in a village fall in love with each other. Will this romance add fuel to the enmity or result in peace?

title: Beauty and the Beast
overview: A live-action adaptation of Disney's version of the classic 'Beauty and the Beast' tale of a cursed prince and a beautiful young woman who helps him break the spell.

title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
overview: Jack Sparrow, a freewheeling 17th-century pirate who roams the Caribbean Sea, butts heads with a rival pirate bent on pillaging the village of Port Royal. When the governor's daughter is kidnapped, Sparrow decides to help the girl's love save her. But their seafaring mission is hardly simple.

title: Kali
overview: A young wife hopes to convince her husband to change his short-tempered attitude toward life, but an incident on a remote highway may finally decide the matter.

title: Premam
overview: Three stages in George's life, and three girls he encounters in each stage.

title: Premam
overview: Vikram falls in love with three women at different stages of his life which changes him as a person until he finally meets the love of his life.
